arts.ttl: BBC pundits react to Celtic fans' songbook with Kieran Tierney message to Brendan Rodgers
arts.sum: The Celtic boss was pretty vocal towards the fans when he defended the team’s style of play after the win over St Mirren and then the Kieran Tierney-related cries . Bonner added: “A wee bit of frustration with the fans kick in when you don’t get it (that second goal).

arts.ttl: Highlights of Celtic v Dundee Utd & Killmarnock v Motherwell
arts.sum: Extended highlights of Celtic v Dundee Utd and Kilmarnock v Motherwell.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers addresses Nicolas Kuhn Celtic injury after pull out in warmup vs Dundee United
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers has addressed Nicolas Kuhn’s issue before Celtic faced Dundee United this evening. The German pulled up before kick-off at Parkhead with what Celtic TV pundit Peter Grant suggested was a thigh issue .

arts.ttl: Watch the best of Celtic's win over stubborn United
arts.sum: Watch highlights as goals from Daizen Maeda and Reo Hatate down Dundee United to send Celtic 16 points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership. (UK only)

arts.ttl: Arne Engels makes notable Celtic impression, hard work is paying off
arts.sum: Arne Engels was star performer during the win over Dundee United.

arts.ttl: Callum McGregor in hilarious Arne Engels noise up as smirking Celtic captain delivers MOTM award theory
arts.sum: Engels impressed against Dundee United but the skipper wasn't letting him get carried away

arts.ttl: No regrets over Celtic fan criticism, insists Brendan Rodgers
arts.sum: No regrets over Celtic fan criticism, insists Brendan Rodgers.

arts.ttl: BBC pundit's verdict on Hyunjun Yang's display as Celtic beat Dundee United
arts.sum: Allan Preston critical of Hyunjun Yang as Celtic beat Dundee United Allan Preston stated that the South Korean star just couldn’t get into the game despite Celtic dominating the ball.

arts.ttl: Mulgrew? Edouard? Green Brigade change up Celtic song sheet during Dundee Utd match
arts.sum: There’s been a bit of tension between Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers and a section of the Hoops support.

arts.ttl: Maeda and Hatate send Celtic further clear in Scottish Premiership
arts.sum: Celtic scored in either half to beat a stubborn Dundee United side and move 16 points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership.
